name: The Maze (Lagiewka)
description:
The Maze is a procedurally generated game with horror ambiance set in a haunted, everchanging maze.

The player must avoid encounters with the spirits in order to find the portal that exits the maze.

This project was created as a case study for ambient lightning, procedural generation and soundplay, and may be improved to a full game at a later date.

The developement team would like to thank the deviant artist midnightstouch for sharing his photoshop brush pack at http://midnightstouch.deviantart.com/art/Little-Lambs-Eat-Ivy-44400248#
